issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Khusro II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with two mural elements, crescent above forehead, wing above crown cap to the left and right, above this crescent and star; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders; pointing upwards; earing consisting of three elements; neck-line of tunica edged with a row of pearls; crescent on left shoulder; both shoulders decorated with crescent and star; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast, two dots on the breast; star in upper left and right field; crescent  at 3 h, 6 h and 9 h; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 1 h l. i. hslwb MLKAn MLKA, 11 h l. o. GDH/ʼpzwt´|Husraw šāhān šāh xwarrah abzūd| “Khusro, King of Kings, he increased the glory”
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: head surrounded by flaming halo; crown cap, crescent above forehead; above ribbons, above uncovered korymbos; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders, pointing upwards; to the left and the right ball of hairs in the neck; neck-line of tunica edged with a row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast, two dots on the breast, dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 'yl'n 'pzwt HWYTWN |Ērān abzūd dānist| “He increased the strength of Iran”; RY 23
